content.query:
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[stream_data]
(
    price int NULL,
    product_id VARCHAR(225) null,
    product_name VARCHAR(225) null, 
    quantity double NULL,
    region VARCHAR(225) null,
    sale_date VARCHAR(225) null,
    sale_id VARCHAR(225) null,
    total_amount double NULL

)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = HASH (col1),

)
GO
